name: TERESA THE OCEAN OF HUMANITY FOUNDATION
briefDescription: tohf is the world's first organization to provide quality education for poor children (breaking all consuetude of society) not in terms just education but also help children to learn, grow, study and enjoy their childhood along with the normal children and in a normal school which is made for specific class of people. We have been working in Maharashtra since 2014 to protect children's right to be educated, to be healthy, to a childhood, to be treated fairly and to be heard. We work with local communities, partners, and the Government. Please get involved with tohf by becoming a fan on Facebook and sharing our stories with your friends. To find out about other ways you can get involved, visit us at http://www.tohf.org.in/
